title: Digit Subsequence
text: Given a string consisting of digits from '0' to '9', find the smallestnon-negativeinteger that does not occur as acontiguous subsequencein the given string.InputInput only contains a string S (|S| â‰¤ 100000), which consists of digits from '0' to '9'.OutputOutput the smallestnon-negativeinteger that does not occur as acontiguous subsequencein the given string.ExampleInput 10123456789Output 110Input 221698921085321984125Output 27Input 301234567891011121314151617181920Output 322
